item.title: Meet the SIPPS Team
item.description: SIPPS is a program developed & run primarily by graduate students in Columbia’s psychology department. Program Directors Ana DiGiovanni is a 2nd-year PhD student working in the Couples Lab with Dr. Niall Bolger. amd2323@columbia.edu Anna Vannucci is a 2nd-year PhD student working in the Developmental and Affective Neuroscience Lab with Dr. Nim Tottenham. av2902@columbia.edu Workshop Instructors Ben Silver is… Hannah Tarder-Stoll is…
